services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Premium solutions tailored to your needs

customSolutions.title: Beyond Templates: True Custom Engineering
customSolutions.description: We don't use WordPress or off-the-shelf templates. Every project is a blank canvas, created from the ground up with clean, modern code to deliver the best experience that is fast, secure, and perfectly aligned to you.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Custom websites and web applications built with cutting-edge technologies for optimal performance and user experience.
webDev.longDescription: We specialize in creating bespoke web solutions, from sleek landing pages to complex enterprise-level applications. Our team leverages the latest frameworks and best practices to ensure your site is fast, scalable, and secure. We work closely with you to understand your goals and deliver a product that exceeds expectations.

automation.title: Automation & Web Scraping
automation.description: Scripts for repetitive tasks, web scraping, data collection, and custom solutions for specific business problems.
automation.longDescription: We create custom scripts to automate your workflows, scrape data from the web, and provide solutions for your business needs, helping you save time and resources.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Improve your search engine rankings and drive organic traffic to your website with our expert SEO services.
seo.longDescription: Our SEO services include keyword research, on-page and off-page optimization, technical SEO, and content strategy to help you rank higher in search results and attract more customers.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Scalable online stores with secure payment processing, inventory management, and optimized conversion rates.
ecommerce.longDescription: We build robust e-commerce platforms that drive sales and provide a smooth shopping experience for your customers. Our solutions include everything you need to run a successful online store, from secure payment gateway integration to advanced inventory management and analytics. We focus on optimizing the user flow to maximize conversion rates.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Expert guidance on technology stack selection, architecture planning, and digital transformation strategies.
consulting.longDescription: Navigating the complex world of technology can be challenging. Our experienced consultants provide strategic advice to help you make informed decisions. We can assist with choosing the right technology stack, designing a scalable and resilient architecture, and developing a roadmap for your digital transformation journey.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Ongoing technical support, performance optimization, and regular updates to keep your digital products running smoothly.
maintenance.longDescription: Our commitment to you doesn't end at launch. We offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages to ensure your website or application remains secure, up-to-date, and performing at its best. Our services include regular backups, security monitoring, performance optimization, and on-demand technical assistance.

hero.title:
Don't Blend In. Stand Out.   
 Dominate.
hero.subtitle: We create premium web solutions that blend with new technology and elegant design to help your brand stand out in the digital space.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Showcasing our finest work across various industries and technologies.

nanobid.title: NanoBid - Auction Platform
nanobid.subtitle: Full Stack Application
nanobid.description: A lightweight and user-friendly online auction platform built from the ground up with vanilla PHP.
nanobid.summaryText: NanoBid is a lightweight, user-friendly online auction platform built from scratch in vanilla PHP. It's designed for auction houses wanting to run their own timed online auctions without expensive third-party services. The application uses a custom Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture, making the code organized, maintainable, and scalable.
nanobid.challengeText: The primary challenge was to design and build a complete, secure, and reliable auction system from scratch using pure PHP, including a custom MVC framework. The goal was to avoid over-engineering and create a clean, maintainable codebase focused on core auction functionalities.
nanobid.solutionText: A custom MVC architecture was implemented to structure the application logically. PDO with prepared statements is used for all database interactions to prevent SQL injection. A custom router handles all requests, directing them to the appropriate controllers. The frontend was built with Bootstrap 5, ensuring a professional and responsive user experience.

kurs8klasisty.title: Kurs8Klasisty - English Tutor Site
kurs8klasisty.subtitle: Web Development for an E-Learning Platform
kurs8klasisty.description: A complete web solution for an online course preparing Polish 8th-grade students for their English language exam.
kurs8klasisty.summaryText: This project is a complete web solution for an online course preparing Polish 8th-grade students for their English exam. The platform includes a public-facing promotional site and an integrated blog, all managed through a secure admin back-end.
kurs8klasisty.challengeText: The main challenge was to build a dual-function system: a dynamic CMS for real-time updates and a high-performance static site, ensuring a seamless user experience and strong security.
kurs8klasisty.solutionText: We built a hybrid system using PHP and MySQL for the backend, with a modern frontend using Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. The admin panel features full content management, while a one-click static site generator boosts performance and security.
